title: The Funniest Tweets On Indian Parents That'll Make You Say 'Damn, That's True!'
text:
The Funniest Tweets On Indian Parents That'll Make You Say 'Damn, That's True!'

The Funniest Tweets On Indian Parents That'll Make You Say 'Damn, That's True!'

Talking of Indian parents there are many things that cross our mind. But what I know is that they are hilarious and can make you laugh in no time. They have the list of best taunts and advice.

Twitter has a whole set of tweets on Indian parents that are pure gold. Laugh out loud and have fun because we love Indian parents, don't we?

1.

We believe in 'Marriage' at first sight.

-Indian parents — Yo_Gi_Ta (@naaag_funny) August 4, 2017

2.

English parents: Good night son.

.

.

.

Indian parents: Gate lock kar ke sona.

"Chor gate se nai ayega" *voices* pic.twitter.com/OZZ1ZmZXT7 — Kotur (@KoturMS) July 17, 2017

3.

Baccho ki shadi

kahan hogi : Maa Baap decide karenge

Kisse hogi: pandit decide karega

Kab hogi: Maa Baap aur Pandit milkar decide karenge

Aur agar fir bhi shadi ke baad koi problem aaye... Toh Bacche nalayak hain.. 😅😅#societyKeSideEffects#IndianParents — Harshit Shandilya (@i_me_HS) September 28, 2019

Don't Miss 171 SHARES 108 SHARES 160 SHARES

4.

What's the most indian parent thing ever?

Literally 1 minute before:"You're old enough to know and pick what you want."

Now: "Whaaaaat noo! You're still our little child, don't even think of such big decisions!" #indianparents #parenting101 #ytho — Krishna (@typicalgodname) August 13, 2018

5.

When parents says "thik hai ,tujhe jo karna hai kar " 😂😂

(What they actually mean ⤵⤵) pic.twitter.com/QyXe68jY7l — Rajni patil 🇮🇳💥🌻 (@indian_patil) July 25, 2017

6.

At 20 yrs

Mom : Will kill u if u r in a relationship.

At 25 yrs

Mom : Let us know if u've got someone in mind.#Indianparents #unbelievable — Krithika© (@This_is_Kritz) April 25, 2017

7.

8.

Indian parents will age-splain you for Life!!! — Gaurav (@Starlord_75) July 22, 2017

9.

Me- papa trip pe jana Tha

Papa- nahi!

Me-par...

Papa- aaj Tak kisi cheez ke liye Mana Kiya Hai?

Me.... #Always #indianparents #trolled — Akshita Gupta (@TheFloatingPen) August 11, 2017

10.

You can win over the world or dictate the world but you bee to be back home before 9 pm#IndianParents #homebefore9 — Amit Bansal (@amitbansal91) July 28, 2017

11.

Dad: Why did the chicken cross the road?

Me: *Oh god not more of these dad jokes*

Dad: To go to Medical college, unlike you#indianparents 🙈 — PARADOXIUM 🦋 (@xLuminosityx) July 6, 2015

12.

Non Indian Parents to their baby : Eat your food and be a good child!!

Indian parents : Jaldi khana kha le warna baba aa jaega!!#ParentingTip 😂 — Nikhil (@nikhil2488) August 4, 2018

13.
description: Talking of Indian parents there are many things that cross our mind. But what I know is that they are hilarious and can make you laugh in no time. They have the list of best taunts and advice if we scan through. From how to deal with life to dealing with them, they are full of wisdom that can be hilarious.
